definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: Some say it is a modern variant of the kudu horn used traditionally in southern African culture.
sentences.chinese: 有人說它是南非傳統的紕角鹿喇叭的現代變體。

sentences.english: It was which involves proving them wrong.
sentences.chinese: 而是我要證明他們是紕謬的。

sentences.english: She likes to talk about symmetrical and asymmetrical triangles .
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡談論對稱和紕謬稱的三角形。

sentences.english: She thinks it wrong that he didn't answer the phone.
sentences.chinese: 她以爲他其時不接電話是紕謬的。

definition: to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to waver
operculum (Latin: little lid)/a covering flap (in various branches of anatomy)
a kind of dog with a long snout/see 獫狁|猃狁[Xian3 yun3]
